title: See BB&T Atlanta Open Tennis and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Galleria
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed See BB&T Atlanta Open Tennis and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Galleria Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Galleria, located near Smyrna, GA offers affordable lodging to guests attending the BB&T Atlanta Open tennis tournament on July 25-August 2, 2015. We are pleased to welcome tennis fans attending the BB&T Atlanta Open. ATLANTA, GA, July 23,   Fans attending the BB&T Atlanta Open tennis tournament will find affordable lodging at the Hampton Inn & Suites Cobb Galleria hotel . Matches will be held at Atlantic Station in midtown Atlanta. ATP players who have committed to play in the tournament include John Isner, Janko Tipsarevic, Marcos Baghdatis, and hometown favorite Donald Young. Andy Roddick, Mardy Fish, and the Bryan brothers will be among the doubles players in the tournament. A concert by The Commodores will follow the opening day matches at 9pm. "We are pleased to welcome tennis fans attending the BB&T Atlanta Open," shares Sabrina Claiborne, Director of Sales at the Hampton Inn and Suites Atlanta Galleria. "Our convenient located near the Cobb Galleria Center is just a few minutes' drive from midtown," continues Ms. Claiborne. This Smyrna GA hotel recently received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award. Hotel guests can expect excellent service and comfortable rooms with free high speed Internet and Hampton Clean and Fresh beds. An in-room microwave and mini refrigerator will help travelers feel at home. The complimentary Hampton On the House Breakfast, with hot and cold favorites, is served each morning in the lobby. Hampton On the Run Breakfast Bags are a quick alternative on weekdays. Guests can relax in the heated indoor pool or enjoy a workout in the fitness center. Other property amenities include a business center, coin laundry, and Pavilion Pantry Market for snacks and sundries. Free weekday shuttle service is available to nearby locations including Cobb Galleria Centre and Cumberland Mall. Current lodging specials include the Weekend Getaway Package with late checkout. AAA, senior, and military discounts are available. HHonors members can earn Double Points or Double Miles through August 31, 2015. The Hampton Inn and Suites Atlanta Galleria is located near the junction of I-75 and I-285. For more information about the BB&T Atlanta Open, visit www.bbtatlantaopen.com . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Galleria hotel call (770) 955-1110 or visit www.HAMPTONINNGALLERIA.com .About Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta-Galleria If you're looking for a great hotel in Atlanta, be a guest at the Hampton Inn & Suites hotel in Atlanta Galleria. It's super-convenient, located within walking distance of the Cobb Galleria Convention Center (which you may be visiting for business in Atlanta). This Atlanta area hotel is also just 12 miles from the Georgia Aquarium, Georgia World Congress Center, Six Flags Over Georgia and the Georgia Dome. The Smyrna, Georgia hotel also offers a broad range of services and amenities to make its guests' stay exceptional. For more information visit: http://www.HamptonInnGalleria.com For all media inquiries, please contact: Allison Reinert
